caption.title: Distribution map of habitat acclimatization for S. sphenanthera based on three GCM in SRES-A2.
caption.p: (A) 2020s in GCM of BC; (B) 2050s in GCM of BC; (C) 2080s in GCM of BC; (D) 2020s in GCM of CC; (E) 2050s in GCM of CC; (F) 2080s in GCM of CC; (G) 2020s in GCM of MI; (H) 2050s in GCM of MI; (I) 2080s in GCM of MI. Future scenarios were regionalized within the study area from the following general circulation models (GCM): BCCR-BCM2.0 (BC), CCCMA_CGCM3 (CC), and MIROC32_medres (MI).
